attributes.action: Make Motorcycle Awareness training mandatory for 'Careless' Car Drivers.
attributes.additional_details:
The local police force stated that as no injuries were sustained it was not going to be followed up. (Bruising doesn't count) 

Families should not have to lose a loved one before car drivers are held to account for carelessness!
attributes.background: On 13th October my Bright Blue Triumph Bonneville was wrecked by a car driver who accelerated through and bounced my whole motorcycle into the outer lane of the roundabout. The drivers response was "I didn't see you"! I was wearing a red jacket, and orange back pack. The visibility was good!

rejection.details: Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action. We're not sure how you would like "careless drivers" to be defined. You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
